createCompanyDialog.title: Create New Company
createCompanyDialog.description: Enter the name for the new company profile.

hero.title: Turn Your Waste into Revenue Automatically
hero.subtitle: Optimize recycling with AI, ensure regulatory compliance, and generate additional income for your business or event.

stats.stat2: Only 13% of waste is currently utilized
stats.stat3: Your company can be part of the 13% that earns money

useCases.title: A Solution for Every Need
useCases.subtitle: Discover how WasteWise adapts to your specific industry to maximize your results.

companies.title: For Companies
companies.description: Reduce operating costs by 40% and generate $30K-100K in annual revenue.

schools.title: For Schools
schools.description: Automatically meet regulations and generate funds for educational programs.

events.title: For Events
events.description: Optimize cleanup by 60% and enhance your sustainability image.

features.title: Everything You Need for Smart Compliance
features.subtitle: From automated logging to AI-powered insights, our platform simplifies every aspect of waste management.

one.title: AI-Powered Analysis
one.description: Leverage artificial intelligence to identify reduction opportunities and optimize your waste streams.

two.title: Detailed Reporting
two.description: Generate comprehensive financial and environmental reports to track your progress and stay compliant.

three.title: Automated Logging
three.description: Easily log waste entries, track materials, and schedule pickups with our streamlined interface.

cta.title: Ready to Transform Your Waste Management?
cta.subtitle: Join WasteWise today and take the first step towards a more sustainable and profitable future.

footer.madeWith: Made with passion for a greener planet.

loginPage.title: Login
loginPage.description: Enter your email below to login to your account.

welcome.title: Welcome to WasteWise: Your Strategic Partner in Smart Environmental Management
welcome.description: WasteWise by EcoCircle merges expertise in environmental services with cutting-edge process automation and AI. Our platform is designed to transform waste management for your company, large-scale event, festival, or concert, offering intuitive tools to optimize your operations.

whatToExpect.title: What can you expect from WasteWise?

centralDashboard.title: Centralized Dashboard:
centralDashboard.description: An intuitive space where you can view and manage all your environmental activities at a glance.

aiAnalyzer.title: AI Analyzer:
aiAnalyzer.description: Our powerful artificial intelligence will soon provide you with deep insights to optimize your waste processes.

wasteLog.title: Waste Log:
wasteLog.description: Simplify the tracking and documentation of your waste, ensuring traceability and regulatory compliance.

calendar.title: Calendar:
calendar.description: Organize and schedule your environmental activities, from collections to audits.

detailedReports.title: Detailed Reports:
detailedReports.description: Generate complete reports to assess your environmental performance, identify areas for improvement, and comply with regulations.

materials.title: Materials:
materials.description: Access relevant resources and documentation for effective environmental management.

gettingStarted.title: Start your journey towards sustainability:
gettingStarted.adminText: To make the most of WasteWise's capabilities, please select or create a company to begin. We are here to help you automate your environmental processes, optimize your resources, and move towards a more sustainable future with the help of artificial intelligence.
gettingStarted.clientText: You are logged in as a client. Please wait for an administrator to assign you to a company to view the dashboard data. If you believe this is an error, please contact your account administrator.

disposals.title: Upcoming Disposals
disposals.description: Scheduled waste pickup and disposal events.

recentEntries.title: Recent Waste Entries
recentEntries.description: A log of the most recently recorded waste entries.

analyzerPage.title: AI Waste Reduction Assistant
analyzerPage.description: Chat with our AI to get insights on your waste data.
analyzerPage.initialMessage: Hello! I'm the WasteWise AI Assistant. Paste your waste data in CSV format, or just ask me to analyze the sample data to see how I can help you with waste reduction insights.
analyzerPage.inputPlaceholder: Ask a question or paste your CSV data here...

totalWaste.title: Total Waste Analyzed
totalWaste.description: Sum of all waste types from input.

toast.title: Analysis Failed
toast.description: Could not analyze the waste data. Please try again.

logPage.title: Waste Log
logPage.cardDescription: A detailed log of all recorded waste entries for the selected company.
logPage.noEntries: No waste entries found for this company.

addWasteDialog.title: Add New Waste Entry
addWasteDialog.description: Record a new waste entry. Click save when you're done.

toast.title: Entry Added
toast.description: Your waste entry has been successfully recorded.

schedulePage.title: Disposal Schedule
schedulePage.description: View and manage upcoming waste collections.

details.title: Collection Details
details.description: Showing all collection events for the selected date.

requestCollectionDialog.title: Request a New Collection
requestCollectionDialog.description: Fill out the form to schedule a new waste pickup.

wasteType.label: Waste Types
wasteType.placeholder: Select one or more waste types

instructions.label: Special Instructions
instructions.placeholder: e.g., Please use the back entrance.

recurrent.label: Recurrent Collection
recurrent.description: Request this collection to occur weekly.

toast.title: Collection Requested
toast.description: Your request has been submitted successfully.

wasteType.required: Please select at least one waste type.

collectionCosts.title: Total Collection Costs
collectionCosts.description: Sum of payments for waste collection.

recyclingIncome.title: Total Recycling Income
recyclingIncome.description: Sum of income from selling recyclables.

netResult.title: Net Cost / Profit
netResult.description: Income minus costs for the period.

transactions.title: Recent Transactions
transactions.description: A log of payments and income.

materialsPage.title: Manage Materials
materialsPage.cardDescription: Add, edit, or remove materials and set their buyback prices.
materialsPage.noMaterials: No materials found. Add one to get started.

deleteDialog.title: Are you sure?
deleteDialog.description: This action cannot be undone. This will permanently delete the material.

materialDialog.description: Fill in the details for the material. Click save when you're done.
materialDialog.name: Material Name

name.min: Name must be at least 2 characters.

save.title: Material Saved
save.description: The material has been successfully saved.

delete.title: Material Deleted
delete.description: The material has been successfully deleted.

compliancePage.title: Legal Compliance Center
compliancePage.description: Monitor and manage your environmental compliance status.

main.title: Compliance Overview
main.description: Stay up-to-date with all legal requirements and documentation.
main.content: This section provides tools and information to help your company adhere to local and national environmental regulations. Track deadlines, access necessary documents, and prepare for audits to ensure full compliance.

regulations.title: Regulations Database
regulations.description: Access a repository of relevant environmental laws and regulations.

reports.title: Compliance Reporting
reports.description: Generate and file necessary compliance reports directly from the platform.

audits.title: Audit Preparation
audits.description: Use our checklists and tools to prepare for upcoming environmental audits.

companiesPage.title: Company Management
companiesPage.cardDescription: Assign client users to each company.
companiesPage.noCompanies: No companies created yet. Add one from the sidebar dropdown.

assignDialog.title: Assign Client
assignDialog.description: Select a client to assign to

editDialog.title: Edit Company Name
editDialog.description: Update the name for this company.

assign.title: Client Assigned
assign.description: The client has been successfully assigned to the company.

update.title: Company Updated
update.description: The company name has been successfully updated.
